buildtools::dbdef::Vars

Detailed Description

Dictionary class for holding variables.

This class can be used to allow conditional expressions in templates, such as "p.name" rather than "p['name']".

Note that the constructor is not overridden, so an instance can be created using constructs such as:

vars = Vars({'name':'Some name'})
